sourcesContent: import { Box, Typography, IconButton } from "@mui/material"; import { Twitter, Instagram } from "@mui/icons-material"; import { useTheme } from "@emotion/react"; import logo from "../../assets/logo/logo-imagen.png"; // Cambié la ruta de la imagen del logo function Footer() { const theme = useTheme(); return ( {/* Lado Izquierdo */} {/* Lado Derecho */} About Us Contact Us Grading Shipping Terms ); } export default Footer;
